name: Warrior Hero Family Revenge
description:
Thousands of years ago, Evil monster attempted to take over Empire with the combined energies of evil forces. They were attacked warrior of legend family and killed them so warrior of Legend decided to take revenge from evil monsters and failed their wishes to take over the empire
so Join Warrior of legend and help him as brave fighter to defend his family as well as earth
Fight with legendary sword and let down the enemies and save the family of legend of warrior as great fighter.
